name: Vancity
address: Vancity, 5672 Victoria Dr, Vancouver, BC V5P 3W4

featured_reviews.review_id: Vancity recently moved half a block south of its old location on Victoria Drive.  New location is modern and ATM machines are now indoors.  Anyway, I would have given the review couple more stars if it wasn't for the inconvenience. It was Sunday morning and I was going to use the ATM but before I open the door I notice a homeless person sleeping on the ground near the ATM machines. This is a young guy in his 20s or 30s. As you can see in my picture attached you can see some sleeping on the ground. As a result I didn't even bother going in as I had a separate similar experience at another location. I am not discriminating homeless people but they shouldn't sleep inside the financial institution. It just make some people feel uncomfortable doing banking. I wish Vancity would do something about it.

I wish Vancity would do something about it.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Why is Vancity Victoria Dr branch closed every Monday?  Back in the 70's it was to make up for working on Saturdays.  Nowadays even the big bank local branches are now open Monday to Saturday!

Also want to add that I've been a member over 40 years and that I do most banking online.  Having to walk over to find a closed branch on Monday when I definitely needed to do a face to face meeting is very frustrating.  Sure there are other Vancity branches open, but now I need to drive my gasoline powered car to another branch further away is definitely not good to the environment!

Please don't make lame excuses and respond directly to why the Victoria Drive branch cannot open Monday to Saturday just like other financial institutions nearby?
featured_reviews.review_text:
Why is Vancity Victoria Dr branch closed every Monday?  Back in the 70's it was to make up for working on Saturdays.  Nowadays even the big bank local branches are now open Monday to Saturday!

Also want to add that I've been a member over 40 years and that I do most banking online.  Having to walk over to find a closed branch on Monday when I definitely needed to do a face to face meeting is very frustrating.  Sure there are other Vancity branches open, but now I need to drive my gasoline powered car to another branch further away is definitely not good to the environment!

Please don't make lame excuses and respond directly to why the Victoria Drive branch cannot open Monday to Saturday just like other financial institutions nearby?
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi JJ, I can understand how inconvenient and challenging this can be for our members that need to visit a branch on Monday. We do have other branches that are open on Monday as well as Saturday, and most banking can be done online. If you require assistance, please call our Member Services Centre at 604-877-7000 Monday to Saturday 8am - 8pm and Sunday 10am - 5:30pm PT. Thank you taking the time to share your feedback with us. -AN

featured_reviews.review_id:
i jget in  today for at Vancity to ask help for cashing out a cheque.... But before coming to Vancity I went  to RBC. next block.
RBC said they will hold it for 4 days. i been with them for almost 10 years.
went to TD to try. also but same thing.

Jade Doolan is an Angel without wings to me today. He help me a lot patiently explaining. and low and behold got somw cash enough time to pay bills... Thank you so much Jade Doolan and to the branch itself.
Right away open my checking account with them. As i am planning to ditch out the bank that I faithfully used for several years and cannot help me a cash out on a cheque.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for reaching out and sharing your positive experience. I will be sure to pass on your kudos to Jade and the staff at the Victoria Drive branch. At Vancity we are committed to providing the best experience possible, and supporting local communities in any way we can. We'd love it if you could spread the word! -JB

featured_reviews.review_id:
Worst login experience.
I had to reset my phone so I lost access to Authenticator app.
I tried to login but it keeps me asking for code that I don't have access without giving me any options to use my phone code or whatever.
I call, but they were all busy, I chose the option to call back. After 2h without getting the call back, I decide to drive to the closest branch (Victoria & 41).
I explain my situation to the guy there, telling that I lost access to my MFA, they give me a receipt with a new password. I go home, resetted my password and then what?? MFA still there!!! Useless!!! I have lost all morning just to login to my account! and still don't have access!
featured_reviews.review_text:
Worst login experience.
I had to reset my phone so I lost access to Authenticator app.
I tried to login but it keeps me asking for code that I don't have access without giving me any options to use my phone code or whatever.
I call, but they were all busy, I chose the option to call back. After 2h without getting the call back, I decide to drive to the closest branch (Victoria & 41).
I explain my situation to the guy there, telling that I lost access to my MFA, they give me a receipt with a new password. I go home, resetted my password and then what?? MFA still there!!! Useless!!! I have lost all morning just to login to my account! and still don't have access!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Laura, thank you for taking the time to share your experience and feedback. I am so sorry to hear the branch did not resolve your issue and I have forwarded your feedback to branch management for staff coaching purposes. If you do not have any alternative methods of authentication set up other than the Authenticator app on your device that was reset, then you will need to reset your MFA. You will need to reach out to our Member Service Centre for assistance by dialing 604-877-7000. I do apologize in advance as our Member Service Centre is experiencing higher than normal call volumes today. - MC

featured_reviews.review_id: This new location is very nice inside but they are extremely slow. The staff were calmly wandering around like they were in their own worlds while there was a long line with some patrons sitting in the floor because they had been waiting so long. Also although it is nice to offer parking under the location (accessible thru the alley) it is not possible to access the elevator to return to your car when you are leaving again as it is in a locked residential building. You will have to walk all the way around the building and down the car ramp to return to your car.
featured_reviews.review_text: This new location is very nice inside but they are extremely slow. The staff were calmly wandering around like they were in their own worlds while there was a long line with some patrons sitting in the floor because they had been waiting so long. featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Malika, thank you for your review. I'm sorry to hear your experience was less than adequate. As a member owned co operative, it really helps to hear from the folks who bank with us to see how we can improve. Take care and enjoy the rest of your week! -TO

featured_reviews.review_id: I used to really like the staff at this branch. However, while there has always been a lot of turnover, there are now many young men working here who couldn't care less that customers may have other things to do besides wait in line for 10+ minutes while they work as though they are asleep. Of course, they constantly wear their masks under their nose or take it off entirely to speak. Very disappointed.
featured_reviews.review_text: I used to really like the staff at this branch. featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Rem, thank you for your review. I'm sorry to hear about your experiences at the branch, and I will be sure to forward your concerns to management. If you'd like to share more feedback, please feel free to call our Member Services Centre at 604-877-7000. -JB

featured_reviews.review_id: ATM is now locked indoors during closing hours. Used to be accessible 24/7.
featured_reviews.review_text: ATM is now locked indoors during closing hours. Used to be accessible 24/7.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Chumba Wumba, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I am sorry to hear you had a negative experience and I understand that ATMs closed after hours is an inconvenience. Feel free to give us a call at 604-877-7000 if you would like to discuss your recent experience in greater detail. -AN

featured_reviews.review_id: Andrea (teller) was very helpful and compassionate about my banking needs. She went out of her way to ensure that I had options to work with and was very friendly.
featured_reviews.review_text: Andrea (teller) was very helpful and compassionate about my banking needs. She went out of her way to ensure that I had options to work with and was very friendly.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Alex, I'm glad to hear that you had such a great experience. At Vancity we do what we can to provide the best service possible, and I will be sure to pass your kind words onto Andrea's manager. Please spread the word! -JB
